```{r}
df_gatherExample <- data.frame(
  country=c("A","B","C"),
  `1999`=c("0.7k","37k","212k"),
  `2000`=c("2k","80k","213k"),
  check.names = F
)


df_gatherExample
gather(df_gatherExample,
       `1999`,`2000`,
       key="年份",value="人口")
```
